item.title: Carckemall
item.description: Readme.md 👋 CrackemAll A Simple Python utility to crack zip and pdf passwords. Installation: Just git clone it using git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/CrackemAll.git install requirements using python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt Now simply python3 cmall.py <mode> <file> <worldlist> Bug report Found any bug! Report it to me at xeroxxhah@pm.me or open an issue Contributions: All contributions are welcomed.fork this repo,improve it and pull requests License Distributed under GPLV3.0

item.title: B1k1
Appsafe
item.description: README.md 👋 AppSafe A simple App Locker written in python. Installation: You can simply install with sudo pip3 install git+https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/AppSafe.git OR Follow these steps: 1st: git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/AppSafe.git 2nd cd AppSafe 3rd sudo python3 setup.py install Usage sudo appsafe Bug report Found any bug! Report it to me at xeroxxhah@pm.me or open an issue Updates: Soon .. Contributions: All contributions are welcomed.fork this repo,improve it and pull requests License Distributed under GPLV3.

item.title: Dos.py
item.description: Readme.md 👋 DOS.PY A Simple yet powerfull Dos script. Installation: Just git clone it using git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/DOS.PY.git Dos.py has only one dependency,i.e scapy.you can install it using python3 -m pip install scapy. Usage: ██████╗░░█████╗░░██████╗░░░██████╗░██╗░░░██╗ ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝░░░██╔══██╗╚██╗░██╔╝ ██║░░██║██║░░██║╚█████╗░░░░██████╔╝░╚████╔╝░ ██║░░██║██║░░██║░╚═══██╗░░░██╔═══╝░░░╚██╔╝░░ ██████╔╝╚█████╔╝██████╔╝██╗██║░░░░░░░░██║░░░ ╚═════╝░░╚════╝░╚═════╝░╚═╝╚═╝░░░░░░░░╚═╝░░░ A simple yet powerful Dos script VERSION:0.1.0 Usage: sudo python3 dos.py <IP> <Port> <no of processes> <type> Example: sudo python3 dos.py 180.50.44.96 80 5000 S Note: Please specify number of processes acording to your system memory or your system might get hang.

item.title: 6u4rd
item.description: README.md 👋 6u4rd Your backdoor for your device. It is a simple utility when it is up and running; you get an email every hour with a unique link. You are presented with a hideous dashboard; you can control your device using this dashboard. Don’t ask me why i did it (._.). Installation & Usage: Follow these steps: 1st: git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/6u4rd.git 2nd: cd 6u4rd 3rd: pip install -r requirements.txt 4th: Setup Dummy Account (Gmail) 5th: Get ngrok token 5th python3 6u4rd.

item.title: A New Beginning
item.description: With each passing day, the world becomes more and more digital. From online shopping to social media, our daily lives are intricately connected to the internet. While the benefits of this digital world are undeniable, it also poses new and unique security challenges. In today’s world, cyber security has become an issue of paramount importance, as cyber criminals are constantly finding new ways to steal sensitive information, compromise systems and cause damage to individuals and organizations alike.
